original_text: I also established my covenant with them to give them the land of Canaan, where they resided as foreigners.
korean_text: 가나안 땅 곧 그들이 거류하는 땅을 그들에게 주기로 그들과 언약하였더니

sentences.original_text: I also established my covenant with them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 그들과 내 언약을 세웠고

sentences.original_text: to give them the land of Canaan
